description:
We have a steady stream of good super hero games in 2024, but many years ago we had a bunch of strange and forgetten ones releasing regularly.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1      

0:00 Intro
0:25 Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
1:52 X-2 Wolverine’s Revenge
3:14 Iron Man VR
4:28 Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series
5:28 Captain America: Super Soldier 
6:32 Batman Begins
7:35 Ultimate Alliance 3
8:32 MARVEL NEMESIS: RISE OF THE IMPERFECTS
9:59 The Punisher
11:09 Deadpool
title: 10 FORGOTTEN Superhero Games That Nobody Remembers
